channel.title: CVE Feed for symless -- synergy-core
channel.description: The latest CVEs for symless -- synergy-core

item.title: CVE-2020-15117|2024-08-04T13:08:21.956Z -- symless -- synergy-core
item.description: In Synergy before version 1.12.0, a Synergy server can be crashed by receiving a kMsgHelloBack packet with a client name length set to 0xffffffff (4294967295) if the servers memory is less than 4 GB. It was verified that this issue does not cause a crash through the exception handler if the available memory of the Server is more than 4GB.
